comment.author: 59406631@N05
comment._content: Photo depicts the first Prime Minister of Tanganyika, Mwalimu Julius Kambarage Nyerere carried shoulder high by mwananchi (citizens) outside Karimjee Hall in Dar-es-salaam - circa 1960 - Uhuru or Independence followed on 9th December, 1961.

comment.author: 67127882@N07
comment._content: The date was 29 March 1961, at the end of the Constitutional Conference held in the Karimjee Hall when it was decided that Independence would come before the end of the year.   Julius Nyerere, holding the placard, was then the Chief Minister of Tanganyika.
